code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./CardSlider.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CardSlider=_ref=>{let{images}=_ref;const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(0);const nextCard=()=>{setCurrentIndex(prevIndex=>(prevIndex+3)%images.length);};const prevCard=()=>{setCurrentIndex(prevIndex=>prevIndex-3<0?images.length-(3-prevIndex%3):prevIndex-3);};const visibleImages=[];for(let i=0;i<3;i++){visibleImages.push({src:images[(currentIndex+i)%images.length],position:i});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-slider",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:prevCard,className:"slide-button prev",children:"\u276E"}),visibleImages.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card ".concat(index===0||index===2?'transparent':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.src,alt:"Slide ".concat(currentIndex+index)})},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:nextCard,className:"slide-button next",children:"\u276F"})]});};export default CardSlider;
